0.Name: Luke
0.Text: Hey, are you ready to go out?

2.Name: Luke
2.Text: Aw man, where are my keys?

3.Name: Luke
3.Text: BananaWasp's is closing in 20 minutes if we don't find them, we won't be able to try their new plate

5.Name: Luke
5.Text: Hey remember how you owe me five bucks?

6.Name: Luke
6.Text: I'm willing to lower it to four if you get my keys.

8.Name: Luke
8.Text: Ah forgot to tell you, [i]there's a [color=red]bomb[/color].[/i]

9.Name: Luke
9.Text: The timer says ten, i guess minutes, no biggie though.
